DKDEPEND(leptonica-1.74.4)

### INSTALL ###
DKINSTALL(${DKONLINE}/Libs/tesseract-3.05.zip tesseract-3.05)
DKSET(TESSERACT ${3RDPARTY}/tesseract-3.05)


### LINK ###
DKINCLUDE(${TESSERACT})
DKINCLUDE(${TESSERACT}/ccutil)
DKINCLUDE(${TESSERACT}/ccstruct)
DKINCLUDE(${TESSERACT}/ccmain)
WIN_DEBUG_LIB(${TESSERACT}/${OS}/Debug/tesseract305d.lib)
WIN_RELEASE_LIB(${TESSERACT}/${OS}/Release/tesseract305.lib)
APPLE_DEBUG_LIB(${TESSERACT}/${OS}/lib/${DEBUG}/libtesseract.a)
APPLE_RELEASE_LIB(${TESSERACT}/${OS}/lib/${RELEASE}/libtesseract.a)
LINUX_DEBUG_LIB(${TESSERACT}/${OS}/Debug/lib/libtesseract.a)
LINUX_RELEASE_LIB(${TESSERACT}/${OS}/Release/lib/libtesseract.a)
ANDROID_DEBUG_LIB(${TESSERACT}/${OS}/Debug/obj/local/armeabi-v7a/libtesseract.a)
ANDROID_RELEASE_LIB(${TESSERACT}/${OS}/Release/obj/local/armeabi-v7a/libtesseract.a)


### COMPILE ###
DKSETPATH(${TESSERACT}/${OS})
WIN32_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G ${GENERATOR} "-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS=/DWIN32 /D_WINDOWS /W3 /nologo" "-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG=/MTd /Od /Ob0 /Zi /RTC1 /DDEBUG /D_DEBUG" "-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE=/MT /O2 /Ob2 /DNDEBUG" -DBUILD_TRAINING_TOOLS=OFF -DLeptonica_DIR=${LEPTONICA}/win32 -DSTATIC=ON ${TESSERACT})
WIN32_VS_DEBUG(tesseract-3.05 tesseract.sln libtesseract)
WIN32_VS_RELEASE(tesseract-3.05 tesseract.sln libtesseract)
